name: SunShine Hou Yi
text: If this card is Summoned, you can banish 2 "SunShine" cards in your GY; draw 2 cards. You can send this card to the GY; send 1 "SunShine" card from your Deck to the GY, but it cannot activate its effects this turn. If this card is sent to the GY: You can banish this card; all "SunShine" monster effects are treated as Quick Effects until the end of your opponent's next turn. You can only use each effect of "SunShine Hou Yi" once per turn.
